Epitech Innovative Project - What is it?

Published the 22 December 2012 by Thomas Romera

The “Epitech Innovative Project” is a really important phase in our studies at Epitech. It’s THE BIG project !

For two years, we’re going to make a project, of our choice, from conception to production and sale. An EIP can be an informatic project, or a human project, what you want, the moment the EIP Laboratory valid it.

I choose to work on a Video Broadcasting solution for startup, little and big enterprises. For example, your company is going to organize a conference. For a maximum of visibility and facility, you certainly may want to broadcast it in real-time, HD, with audio and a fabulous PowerPoint to share with your public. All this in one solution, from capture to broadcast. If you want more information, you can go to Plug&Stream Website !

As a Project Manager, I will have to :


  • Make this EIP accepted by the EIP Laboratory

  • Find a good team, with the good resources, seven people at least

  • Develop my part, I think I’m goind to specialize in FFMPEGand Cloud Technology
  • Organize weekly video-conferencing with the team (Excepting a lot of trouble, in 4th year, we have to move in a foreign country, so with jet lag of all the team, it should be fun =D)

  • Finish the project, technically and commercially.
